Class HourlyEmployee

java.lang.Object

public class HourlyEmployee extends Employee
This class provides methods to handle hourly payed employee conditions

  • Method Details

    • submithours

      public void submithours(String month, int year, String employeeid) throws IOException
      This method recognises the employees attempt to submit hours. If its possible to submit hours for the given time then we update the value of the employees's hours in their csv file
      Parameters:
      month - , This is the month for which our employee is submitting their hours for
      year - , The combination of our month and year gives us the key for our hashmap
      employeeid - , This is the employee id of the person submitting their hours
      Throws:
      IOException

      public float gethour1(String month, String year)
      Used to get hours of a certain week
      Parameters:
      month - , month of the hour
      year - , year of the month
      Returns:
      this returns the number of hours worked during the first week of the specified month and year

    • getSubmittable

      public ArrayList<LocalDate> getSubmittable()

    • getHourlyPay

      public double getHourlyPay()
      Calculates hourly pay;

      Hourly paid employees have a salary based on a 40 hour work week, we can therefore estimate their hourly pay by dividing their hourly pay by 52(weeks in a year) and then by 40(work week hours)

      Returns:
      Returns hourly pay as a double
